message.content:
cs.DL, cs.IR, cs.CY, cs.CR, cs.AI 

Reasoning: The paper discusses the use of bibliometric methods to support research management, which is relevant to several sub-categories in computer science. cs.DL (Digital Libraries) is the most likely category as the paper deals with bibliometric methods. cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is also likely as the paper discusses the use of title words and references to approximate specialties. cs.CY (Computers and Society) and cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) are also possible categories as the paper discusses research funding policies and evaluation processes. Finally, cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is a possible category as the paper discusses the use of algorithms to support research management.
